sections.title: SALSAS / DIPS (Served with corn Tortilla chips)

items.name: Guacamole
items.description:
Guacamole with herbs and ajo perejil, served with corn Tortilla chips on the side garnished with a herb salad.
Definitions:
Guacamole: Originates from Aztecs (avocados, tomatoes, chiles, salt), Spanish added onion, lime, coriander.
Ajo Perejil: Spanish staple marinade (garlic, parsley, olive oil, salt).

items.name: Sikil Pak
items.description:
Hazelnut sikil pak with guajillo powder and tortilla chips served on the side.
Definitions:
Sikil Pak: Pre-Hispanic Yucatan dip (toasted pumpkin seeds, habanero, roasted tomato).
Guajillo Chili: Dry form of mirasol pepper, common in Mexican cuisine.

items.name: Green Pipian
items.description:
Green pipian with pistachios and jalapeño, served with roasted pistachio, pumpkin seeds and corn tortillas chips on the side.
Definition: Pipián: Mexican sauce with puréed greens, thickened with ground pumpkin seeds; origins in Aztec, Purepecha & Mayan cuisines.

items.name: Oysters
items.description: Carlingford oysters served with Pomegranate mignonette, red currant berries, shallots and jalapeno. (Carlingford Lough oysters benefit from tidal water exchange and freshwater flow, giving distinctive flavour).

items.name: Prawn Croquettes
items.description:
Prawn croquettes, served with Kewpie mayo, habanero sweet and sour, Katsuobushi (bonito flake), Nori, and a lime wedge. (3 pieces per portion, possible to add a fourth).
Definitions: Katsuobushi: Bonito flakes (simmered, smoked, fermented skipjack tuna) for umami.
items.allergens: Cereals/Gluten, Crustaceans, Eggs, Fish (Bonito), Milk (Incl Lactose), Sesame Seeds, Soya.
items.dietaryInfo: Alcohol (White Wine, Mirin), Citrus (Lime), Garlic, Nightshade (Habanero, Morita), Onion.

items.name: Padrón Peppers
items.description:
Padrones with salsa macha, morita and lime salt.
Definition: Padrón Peppers: Small, green peppers from Galicia, Spain; usually mild, but about 1 in 10 is spicy.

items.name: Seabass Ceviche
items.tagline: Delica Pumpkin & Leche de Tigre (Note: Details mention Yuzu & Tomatillo)
items.description:
A seabass ceviche, rice crackers, with leche de tigre, pico de gallo.
Definition: Ceviche: Raw meat or fish cured in citrus.

items.name: Sweet Plantain (Maduro)
items.description:
A Ripe Plantain, with a Queso Mix. Accompanied by Togarashi, Lemon Balm, Guacachile and a Habanero ash.
Definition: Togarashi: Japanese spice blend for a fiery umami kick.

items.name: Tuna Tostones (Tostada)
items.tagline: Crudo with Coriander Mayo & Ancho Chilli
items.description:
Crispy tortilla, topped with ancho chilli spread, coriander mayo, layered slices of tuna sashimi, radish relish and coriander leaf.
Definitions:
Tostada: "Toasted" tortilla, often flat, with toppings.
Ancho Chilli: Mild, earthy, fruity dried poblano chilli.

items.name: Shiitake Taco
items.tagline: With Tare, Shoyu & Daikon (Note: Description differs)
items.description:
A Taco with Romesco, Shiitake Sofrito, White Onion, Coriander and a Lime wedge.
Definition: Shoyu: Soy Sauce (white version used here).
items.dietaryInfo: Alcohol (Mirin, Sake, White Wine), Citrus, Garlic, Mushroom, Nightshade (chilli), Onion.

items.name: Baja Fish Taco
items.description: Baja style cod taco, with Morita Mayo & cabbage coleslaw.

items.name: Pork Carnita Taco
items.description:
Pork Carnitas with Avocado salsa verde & xnipek.
Definition: Tomatillo: Small, green, tangy fruit used in Mexican cuisine, key for salsas.

items.name: Chicken Tinga Taco
items.description: Taco with Chicken tinga, Al Pastor sauce, charred pineapple, pickled red onion, and coriander.
items.dietaryInfo: Citrus, Garlic, Nightshade (chilli), Onion. (Note: May contain gluten - check with kitchen).

items.name: Flautas (Paneer Flauta)
items.tagline: Three, Chilli Paneer with Salsa Verde & Cheese Costra (Note: Description differs)
items.description:
A Flauta with Paneer, Salsa Criolla, Salsa Macha and Morita Oil. (3 pieces per portion, possible to add a fourth).
Definition: Paneer: Fresh, soft Indian cheese from curdled milk.
items.allergens: Eggs, Milk (Incl Lactose - Paneer, Mozzarella), Sesame Seeds.

items.name: Lamb Birria Papusa
items.tagline: Mozzarella & Caraway Slaw (Note: Details use Cumin Slaw)

items.name: Fried Chicken Torta
items.description:
Warm torta with tempura fried chicken, avocado and salsa guajillo. Finished with pickled jalapenos and salad.
Definition: Torta: Hot/cold sandwich on a crusty roll.
items.allergens: Eggs (Mayo), Milk (Incl Lactose - Whey), Soya, Sulphites (Vinegar). (Confirm Gluten in dredge/tempura).

items.name: Ice Cream Sandwich
items.description: Ice cream Sandwich made with corn ice cream, corn brittle, sable biscuit & corn salted caramel.

items.name: Churros
items.description:
Cinnamon sugar churros served with two dipping sauces: Chocolate Tonka Sauce & Dulce de leche.
Definitions:
Churros: Fried dough dessert (Spanish/Portuguese cuisine). Dough contains no dairy.
Tonka Bean: Similar to vanilla but nuttier/spiced.
items.allergens: Cereals/Gluten, Eggs, Milk (Incl Lactose - Dulce de Leche), Soya (Choc Sauce). (Note: Churros dough is dairy-free but contains egg).
